name: Island Collector
description:
Explore small island, collect coins and try to get to the goal!

This is my first game/real project. I know it is not much, but it is a first step. I made it mostly because of learning new things and actually publishing something for first time. 

It is a short game so give it a try and have fun!

Credit to Abstraction for Ludum Dare 30 - Track 1 soundtrack! :)
Link Abstraction's bage: http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
